string-array.name: headlines
string-array.item: Russia carries out nuclear submarine drills in Barents Sea
Twitter to label tweets having content from Russian state media
Russian music conductor fired by Munich over support for Putin

string-array.name: articles
string-array.item: Russia carries out nuclear submarine drills in Barents Sea, days after Vladimir Putin ordered his nuclear forces to be put on high alert amid invasion of Ukraine.
Twitter will be labelling and reducing the visibility for tweets containing content from Russian state-affiliated media websites like RT and Sputnik.
The city of Munich announced that it has fired Valery Gergiev as the chief conductor of the phillaharmonic orchestra over his support to Russian President Vladimir Putin.
